data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The "Color::Calc" module implements simple calculations with RGB
    colors. This can be used to create a full color scheme from a few
    colors.

    The module is useful for CGI (or embedded perl) programmes that
    create HTML or CSS output. Nevertheless, this module only deals with
    colors, so it belongs into Color::*, not HTML::*, CGI::*, or
    similar.

    There's currently no module that implements a similar
    functionality.
